             int column,
             Color color,

        Constructor for piece
        Parameters:
        row - Row on the board for the new piece
        column - Column on the board for the new piece
        color - true if White, false if Black
        type - type of piece

        public Type getType()
        Gets the type of this piece
        Returns:

      • canKill

        public boolean canKill()
        Check if this piece can kill other pieces
        Returns:
        false if this piece is a softbarrier, else true
